こほん……全学園生の皆さん。恐らく待っていた方も多いでしょう。\n日々の鍛錬の成:
Ahem... All the students. I'm sure a lot of them were waiting for us.
The day has come for me to show off the fruits of my daily training.
本日より、公式ＭＧ競技シーズン開幕を宣言します！！: Today marks the start of the official MG season!!
――それでは競技を開始する前に、\n改めてルールについて確認しておきましょう。:
—Now then, before the competition begins...
Let's go over the rules again.
成長したチームも色々といるし、楽しみだね～♪\nどんなふうに暴れちゃおうかなー♪:
There are a lot of mature teams out there, so I'm looking forward to it~♪
I wonder how I'll go on a rampage♪
ほどほどにして下さいね……\nサポートする側は大変なんですから。:
Please don't overdo it...
It's a lot of work for the support side.
ふふ、待ちに待った公式ＭＧ競技……\nシリウスシュガーには負けていられん。気合を:
Heehee. The long-awaited official MG competition...
I can't lose to Sirius Sugaru. I'll give it my all.
そうね。柊校舎には、私達カラフルブーケもいる……\nそんな風にちゃんと知ってもら:
That's right. We have a colorful bouquet in the Hiiragi building, too...
That's the kind of thing you need to know.
みんなやる気満々だな……\nそりゃそうか、メイズの採掘許可区域が決まるわけだしな:
Everyone's all fired up...
Well, that's true. After all, the Mayse mining permit zone will be decided.
……って、どうしたんだめる？ そんな青い顔をして。: ...Wait, what's wrong? You look so pale.
マスター！ 以前の活躍もあってか、\nシリウスシュガーは現在ものすごく注目されて:
Master! Maybe it's because of what you did before,
Sirius Sugaru is attracting a lot of attention right now!
つまりマークされてるってわけか……\nそりゃ不安にもなるよな。:
In other words, it's marked...
Of course I'd be worried.
は、はい……その通りです……今までと違って、\n下手な結果を見せれないなって思う:
Y-Yes... That's right... Unlike before,
The thought of not being able to show any poor results puts a lot of pressure on me.
何をビビってるんだ。カオスメイデンに勝ったお前たちの実力は本物だ。\nお前らを鍛:
What are you freaking out for? You beat Chaos Maiden, and your skills are real.
I've trained all of you, so I guarantee it. Go fight with your head held high!
そろそろ生徒会長の話も終わりそうだな。: Looks like we're almost done talking about the student council president.
――さて、説明は以上となります。\n悔いの残らぬよう、全力を尽くすように。:
—Now then, that concludes my explanation.
So as not to leave any regrets behind, so as to give it everything she had.
それでは――公式ＭＧ競技、開始です！: Now then, let's begin the official MG Competition!
